ovdesc.p: This static information file is used to record the annual rate charged by each depository on security holdings with that depository. These charges will be applied on pro-rata basis to all securities held in the depository within a charge period.

desc.p: Specifies the annual rate charged by the depository on security holdings.
1-10 numeric character customer number or 3-10 type MNE (uppercase alpha or numeric or ".") character mnemonic customer id. (Mandatory input)
Must be the ID of a valid customer for whom the CUSTOMER.SECURITY file record ("CUSTOMER.TYPE") equals ("DEPOSITORY").
